H0.text: Which car company produces the Meriva model. Opel

H1.text: Which car company produces the Meriva model. Ford

H2.text: Which car company produces the Meriva model. Renault

H3.text: Which car company produces the Meriva model. VAUXHALL

A4.text: The Opel Meriva is a car manufactured and marketed by the German automaker Opel on its Corsa platform

A5.text: The Meriva was marketed as the Vauxhall Meriva in the United Kingdom
